title: Solve
text: The first step is to rewrite one of the equations in terms of one of the variables.

title: Solve
text: Rewrite the second equation in terms of $$y$$. What is the equation you end up with?

title: Substitute
text: Next, substitute the second equation into the first. Use the x-value you found in the previous hint, and simplify until you find the value of $$y$$.

title: Solve
text: Solve for $$y$$ with the new substituted equation. What is the value of $$y$$?

title: Substitute
text: Next, substitute the value of $$y$$ that you now know into either or the original equations. Solve for $$x$$ to find the numeric solution the system of equations.

title: Solve
text: What does $$x$$ equal when the $$y$$ value is substituted into either of the original equations?

title: Interpret
text: Knowing that $$x=4$$ and $$y=-3$$, we can finalize our answer to be $$(4,-3)$$
